predicate.note: Frames file for 'hatch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 26.2 and 26.1, Framenet entry Invention.

example.name: passive agentive
example.text: The President came up with a good bill, but now may end up signing the awful bureaucratic creature hatched [*] on Capitol Hill.

example.name: active agentive
example.text: FAST-FOOD chicken chains, faced with a worsening business slump, are struggling [*-1] to hatch some new marketing strategies.
example.arg: [*-1] -> FAST-FOOD chicken chains, faced with a worsening business slump,

example.name: ergative
example.text: The egg under John's pillow finally hatched, releasing some kind of slimy alien creature.
example.arg: releasing some kind of slimy alien creature
